original_title: You're Gorgeous I Love Your Shirt
overview: Featuring Tonya Harris and her daughter Lyndsey and their powerful story of how so many parents are unaware what's happening in school with their child, because the child doesn't want to be a burden, and how she missed the signs that her daughter was in more distress than they ever knew.
tagline: An Inside Look at Bullying and Mental Health
title: You're Gorgeous I Love Your Shirt
